description:
The next generation lies on the shoulders of the young. Fairy Tail has candidates for the next master like Laxus and Erza, but Makarov doesn`t feel the time is quite right yet to give up his position. Then, Fairy Tail`s strongest team, centered around Erza, goes on a mission! In high spirits, they set out to handle the request to help put on a play... Or so they thought, because it seems there`s been a casting change! Could this actually be entertaining to everyone?
Source: crunchyroll
